survey.question: Death of a significant person?
survey.description: (eg. A spouse, friend, relative, family member, or pet.)

survey.question: Separation/Breakup or Divorce?
survey.description: (eg. Your own, your family's, a companion's)

survey.question: Serious sickness or injury?
survey.description: (eg. Cancer, heart attack, stroke, seizures, leukemia, broken bones, etc)

survey.question: Health/ Medical problems?
survey.description: (eg. Allergic reactions, asthma, hay fever, menopause, infection etc.)

survey.question: Diagnosed with mental illness?
survey.description: (eg. Anxiety, Depression Eating/Personality/Panic disorders, Phobias, OCD, ADHD, etc.)

survey.question: Bad at comprosing yourself/maintaining your health/handling pressure
survey.description: (eg. Controlling your anger, anxiety, panic, worry, nervousness, etc.)

survey.question: Troubles you have no courage to tell anyone about?
survey.description: (eg. Fear of being burdensome, getting help, coming out, unspoken opinions, etc.)

survey.question: Conflict with spiritual, moral or ethical values?
Conflict/Challenges within family, friends or extended family?
survey.description: (eg. Major increase in argument between family members, communication etc.)

survey.question: Parenting, childcare, being a parental guardian?
Pregnancy troubles?
survey.description: (eg. worrying about going into labour, miscarriage, eating too much)

survey.question: Changes within family, friends or extended family?
survey.description: (eg. Family member leaving home, moving to a different country, gaining a new family member etc.)

survey.question: Home sick?
survey.description: (eg. away from home, international students, living independently etc.)

survey.question: Faced/facing any kind of discrimination, bullying or harassment?
survey.description: (eg. sexual harassament, getting targeted/picked on, prejudice, unkind/rule comments etc.)

survey.question: Have you been betrayed by someone before?
survey.description: (eg. family, friend, compannion, girlfriend/boyfriend etc.)

survey.question: Do you feel guilty or regreful of actions done in the past?
survey.description: (eg. cheating, bullying, guilt, manipulation, not studying to your fullest potential etc.)

survey.question: Having a tendency to avoid things?
survey.description: (eg. responsibilities, admitting faults etc.)

survey.question: Bad at handling change/unfamiliar situations?
survey.description: (eg. moving out, graduation, interrupted routines etc.)

survey.question: Financial troubles?
survey.description: (eg. Overdue credit card payments, loans, debt, mortage, living costs etc.)

survey.question: Major change in social activities?
survey.description: (eg. Becoming more/less sociable, joining a club/team etc.)

survey.question: Too many responsibilities?
survey.description: (eg. work overload, demanding/unreasonable dedlines, being relied on too much etc.)

survey.question: Major Changes regarding work/education?
survey.description: (eg. changing to a different line of work, changing university courses/papers, transferring schools etc.)

survey.question: Major changes in working hours or conditions?
survey.description: (eg. change in working shifts, super early/late classes in university etc.)

survey.question: Conflict with friends, classmates, teachers, co-workers, boss, customers?
survey.description: (eg. clashing opinions, unfriendly, un-respectful etc.)

survey.question: Insecurity in your progress or status within school, the workforce or your lifestyle?
survey.description: (eg. Promotions/demotions, grades, fear of failing, university isn't working out for you, hitting a slump etc.)

survey.question: Facing culture shock/Adapting to a new culture?
Bad time management?
survey.description: (eg. Bad at controlling procrastination, easily distracted, constantly avoiding tasks etc.)

survey.question: Worrying/nervousness?
survey.description: (eg. difficulty speaking in public, social interaction, new environment, getting put on the spot etc.)

survey.question: Do you have addiction?
survey.description: (eg. Drugs, gambling, games, social media etc.)

survey.question: Pet troubles?
survey.description: (eg. increase in visits to the vet, pet behaviour changes, aging etc.)

survey.question: Working under dangerous conditions?
survey.description: (eg. Dangerous jobs, illegal jobs, blackmail, threats, harassment etc.)

survey.question: Unclear/unrealistic expectations from others?
survey.description: (eg. Unrealistic expectations from partner, parents, family, team-mates, teachers, boss, colleagues etc.)

survey.question: Have you violated the aw before?
Are you currently under detention, house arrest, jail or other institutions?
